abstract.p: Douglas E McMahon is named chairman and chief executive of Publicis in New York (S)

block.p: Publicis in New York, part of the American division of the Publicis Groupe S.A., yesterday named a top executive to fill a long-vacant post.

Douglas E. McMahon, was named chairman and chief executive. He had been senior vice president for marketing and research at CNBC in Fort Lee, N.J., part of the NBC unit of General Electric. Mr. McMahon, 35, also worked at agencies like J. Walter Thompson, part of the WPP Group, and the Grey Worldwide unit of the Grey Global Group.
Publicis in New York, part of the American division of the Publicis Groupe S.A., yesterday named a top executive to fill a long-vacant post.

Douglas E. McMahon, was named chairman and chief executive. He had been senior vice president for marketing and research at CNBC in Fort Lee, N.J., part of the NBC unit of General Electric. Mr. McMahon, 35, also worked at agencies like J. Walter Thompson, part of the WPP Group, and the Grey Worldwide unit of the Grey Global Group.
He will report to Robert H. Bloom, chairman and chief executive at Publicis in the United States, also based in New York.
Mr. McMahon will work with Tony DeGregorio, chief creative officer at Publicis in New York.
